name: Breached (itch) (yellowduck)
description:
Breached is a twin-stick shooter and maze escape game, in this demo, you have 4 weapons. Your job is to kill the monsters and escape the maze facility. Your default weapon is SMG, you can also pick up a shotgun, a machine gun and a grenade launcher in this first demo. More weapons will come in future development as well.
To install the game:
-Download
-Unzip
-Play

If you like this game, please donate to support this project :)
Thanks and enjoy!
